articles.title: Maha breaches 200-mark after 40 days; 60% cases from Mum
articles.description: The state on Thursday breached the 200-mark after 40 days to report 233 new cases of Covid-19. Mumbai contributed to nearly 60% of the fresh cases with 130 new detections. There were no deaths or any notable rise in hospitalisations.
